A4.text: The following autocephalous churches have strong historical ties to the Coptic Orthodox Church. Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church

A5.text: There are between 150,000 and 200,000 adherents in Sudan.

A6.text: They live mainly in the United States (500,000), Sudan (400,000-500,000), Australia (75,000), Libya (60,000), Canada (50,000), France (45,000), Italy (30,000), the United Kingdom (25,000â€“30,000), the United Arab Emirates (10,000) and the Netherlands (10,000).

A7.text: Copts are a Christian ethnoreligious group native to Northeast Africa who have primarily inhabited the area of modern Egypt since antiquity.

A8.text: U.S. Department of State International Religious Freedom Report: Egypt
